last_episode_to_air.name: Fall of a Jungle Civilisation
last_episode_to_air.overview: New discoveries are revealing a forgotten civilisation that once thrived in the jungles of the Amazon. But what happened to it? Are there clues to what caused the collapse in today’s battles against deforestation, gold mining, and disease? And do the surviving Amazonian people face a similar fate?

name: Amazon: The Lost World
overview: The series digs for remains of some of the earliest Amazonians, seeking clues to how villages grew, and how the jungle itself was tamed for agriculture on a massive scale.

episodes.name: Lost Jungle Civilisation
episodes.overview: New discoveries in the Amazon rainforest are revealing evidence of a long-lost civilisation. Mysterious geometric shapes carved into the Brazilian landscape, ditches in the forest, and giant mounds on the plains of Bolivia – are these remnants of ancient jungle cities?

episodes.name: Beginnings of a Jungle Civilisation
episodes.overview: New discoveries are revealing a forgotten civilisation that once thrived in the jungles of the Amazon. But who created it and when? Archaeology and technology trace the first steps of a forgotten jungle civilisation.

episodes.name: Fall of a Jungle Civilisation
episodes.overview: New discoveries are revealing a forgotten civilisation that once thrived in the jungles of the Amazon. But what happened to it? Are there clues to what caused the collapse in today’s battles against deforestation, gold mining, and disease? And do the surviving Amazonian people face a similar fate?
